original_title: Ensemble, nous allons vivre une très, très grande histoire d'amour...
overview: Dorothée and Nicolas fall in love at first sight. Together, they’re going to live a very beautiful love story... they know it. But life always finds a way to compromise the best resolutions, the best script, and nothing will happen as expected. Nicolas and Dorothée will be carried into a stormy comedy as crazy as their passion for each other…
title: A Very Very Beautiful Love Story
